metadata.title: CVE-2016-6318 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the FascistGecosUser function inlib/fascist.c in cracklib allows local users to cause a denial of service(application crash) or gain privileges via a long GECOS field, involvinglongbuffer.

criterions.comment: cracklib2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
